channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenX -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenX -- all products

item.title: CVE-2013-4211|2024-08-06T16:38:01.692Z -- openx -- ad%20server
item.description: A Code Execution Vulnerability exists in OpenX Ad Server 2.8.10 due to a backdoor in flowplayer-3.1.1.min.js library, which could let a remote malicious user execute arbitrary PHP code
